content.text:
Here are all **8 Facebook Ads products** available:

## Facebook & Instagram Placements

| Product | Description | Category | Standard CPM | Premium CPM |
|---------|-------------|----------|--------------|-------------|
| **Facebook News Feed Ads** | High-visibility in-feed placements within the Facebook News Feed | Social/Feed | $12 | $18 |
| **Facebook Stories Ads** | Full-screen vertical ads between Facebook Stories with swipe-up CTAs | Social/Stories | $8 | $14 |
| **Facebook Reels Ads** | Short-form video ads within Facebook Reels | Social/Video | $10 | $16 |
| **Facebook Marketplace Ads** | Native placements reaching users with high purchase intent | Social/Commerce | $6 | $10 |
| **Messenger Ads** | Ads within Messenger inbox driving click-to-message interactions | Social/Messaging | $10 | $15 |
| **Instagram Feed Ads** | Seamless in-feed placements on Instagram | Social/Feed | $14 | $22 |
| **Instagram Stories Ads** | Full-screen immersive ads between Instagram Stories | Social/Stories | $10 | $18 |
| **Audience Network** | Extend campaigns to third-party apps and websites | Social/Network | $4 | $8 |

**Key Insights:**
- **Most Premium:** Instagram Feed Ads ($14-$22 CPM) - highest engagement with visual audiences
- **Most Affordable:** Audience Network ($4-$8 CPM) - broadest reach at lower cost
- **Best for Commerce:** Facebook Marketplace ($6-$10 CPM) - high purchase intent
- **Best for Engagement:** Stories formats on both platforms deliver immersive experiences

All products support both standard and premium pricing tiers depending on targeting and optimization goals.
